TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ContextMenuService extends System.Object
public ref class ContextMenuService abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于显示 的系统实现。

span.span: Provides the system implementation for displaying a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了可以用于指定的外观和位置的上下文菜单的附加的属性。The class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu. 中的属性的许多类还由。Many of the properties in the class are also defined by the . 有时会更方便，通过使用设置的属性通过上设置的属性类比。Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the class than by setting the properties on a . 例如，你可以创建要由多个元素共享，但使用类指定的不同位置每个元素。For example, you can create a to be shared by multiple elements, but use the class to specify a different position of the for each element. 由定义以下属性和类。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果上述任一属性上都设置和，属性值从使用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 你还可以使用禁用项上显示菜单。You can also use the to display menus on disabled items. ## Examples 下面的示例将相同对两个按钮和集， ， ， ，和属性设置到每个按钮的不同位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xaml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)] 下面的示例演示如何使用服务来显示上已禁用的按钮。The following example shows how to use the service to display a on a disabled button. 请注意，你将设置上的按钮时的上下文菜单的父属性。Notice that you set the property on the button that is the parent of the context menu. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#3)]
